snippet: An federal inspector in January found dirty bathrooms and storage areas at a facility operated by Flying Food Group, according to a report to be released by a labor union.
abstract: Pending report from airline food workers union United Here cites investigation by Food and Drug Admin inspector that found unsanitary conditions in food service facilities at Los Angeles International Airport; facilities are operated by Flying Food Group, and inspectors have found similar conditions at several kitchens operated by company.
lead_paragraph: An federal inspector in January found dirty bathrooms and storage areas at a facility operated by Flying Food Group, according to a report to be released by a labor union.

headline.main: Filth Found in Airline Food Operations at Los Angeles Airport
headline.print_headline: Inspection Finds Hygiene Issues With Airline Food Operations at Los Angeles Airport
